attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: get the goverment to work for british people not british people to work for the rest of the world

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.  You should be more specific about what you want the Government to do, for example, introduce a particular policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
